title: The Intelligence; “This attempt, to use it as a tool to make it riskier for the West, will fail”—Russia's annexation bid
text:
AFTER A SERIES of sham referendums, President Vladimir Putin is expected to annex four partly occupied regions of Ukraine. We ask what risks that move would pose. What has driven China's president to amass such tremendous personal power? We introduce our new, long-form podcast “The Prince”, which dives deep into his life. And video-game music is rapidly growing in prestige. Runtime: 23 min

Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneIn

For full access to print, digital and audio editions of The Economist, subscribe here www.economist.com/intelligenceoffer
